electronicInfo.title: I, the undersigned, acknowledge that we have reviewed the Sea Crest Family Handbook and agree to abide by the policies, procedures, sentiments, rules, regulations, and routines shared within. I understand that these may be amended or modified at the School's sole discretion.

electronicSignatureInfo.body: By signing my name and clicking the 'Submit' button, I am certifying that I agree to submit this Waiver electronically. I have read and accepted all of the terms and conditions on all pages of this Waiver. I am verifying that I am the person whose name appears below and agree that typing my name below and clicking 'I agree' is the legal equivalent to a manual signature on a document. For those who do not agree to sign electronically, they may print out this Waiver and manually sign it and return it to School.
